nirogimath janathawak - samruddhimath palathak bihikirima udesa karyakshamawuth, gunathmakawuth saukhya sewawak laba denuwas, uthuru mada palathe siyaluma saukhya aayathana sawibala ganwime udarathara mehewaraka niyali palath saukhya sewa departhamenthuwa saha ehi siyaluma karya mandalaya ee sadaha apa kapa wi sitithi.
